message: I'm being generous, but let's get this over with quickly.
I'm not getting taken advantage of this easily. You're getting a smaller share than me, but it's still a decent offer. Don't expect me to go lower.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving in to your demands. This is my final offer.
I'm not budging. You're still getting a better deal than you would in a court of law. Take it or leave it.
